Name: Battle Mine Sweeper
About the game: You can enjoy the adventure mode of all 60 stages of the first part 30 and the second part 30. You can compete with other players in the weekly score ranking for your trained skills. The more you fight, the more skills you learn, and the higher your skill level, the more you will overwhelm the enemies you have been struggling with. [Main skills] Whole body blow 　Shoot a whole blow to the opponent Counter attack 　Inflict damage to the other party Item destruction 　Destroy the item possessed by the other party Item robbery 　Steal the item that the other party has Continuous action 　You can act continuously Clairvoyance 　Attack items are prioritized in the search Patience 　Endure leaving 1 instead of 0 HP Berserker 　AP will increase dramatically when it becomes a disadvantageous situation
